title: Manny Pacquiao calls out Floyd Mayweather and suggests fight with billionaire Jack Ma
text:
Manny Pacquiao has issued a direct call-out to his age old rival Floyd Mayweather, offering the boxing legend an interesting proposition.

Talk of an iconic Mayweather vs Pacquiao rematch has been swirling for months, though no agreement has been signed off by the duo.

Now, while back heavily on the training regime, Pacquiao has urged Mayweather to either face him and take the option of a 'real fight' or, intriguingly, take up an exhibition option and step into the ring with Chinese business magnate and billionaire Jack Ma.

Scroll down for video

Manny Pacquiao has issued a direct call-out to his age old rival Floyd Mayweather

The Filipino legend has suggested billionaire Jack Ma face Mayweather in an exhibition

Ma, 55, showed off his abilities by pummeling the pads held aloft by Pacquiao

Pacquiao took to social media on Sunday to issue the direct call to Mayweather, personally addressing him in a short video published via Twitter.

In it, Pacquiao could be seen on the pads inside a serene conservatory, overlooking plush gardens.

Alongside him, 55-year-old Ma had donned the gloves and was unleashing a flurry of punches, before the pair turned to directly address the camera.

'Floyd Mayweather, if you want a real fight, fight me,' Pacquiao began, while beating his chest with the pads.

Ma himself then issued the call and insisted he was ready to go up against Mayweather

'If you want an exhibition, my guy, my friend Jack Ma will take care of you - the real Manny team.'

The Filipino boxing legend then allowed Ma to take over the call-out, confirming that he was ready to take on the undefeated Mayweather in the ring.

'Yeah I am ready. Any time, any place. Manny's team is ready!' Ma added.

Though 'money' Mayweather frequently prides himself on his lavish earnings and status as one of the richest athletes who has ever walked the earth, his wealth pales in comparison with that of Ma.

As of 2019, Mayweather's net-worth stands around the $750 million (£590m) mark, according to Forbes.

Mayweather revels in his status of one of the richest athletes to have ever walked the earth

Ma's net worth of $31billion makes Mayweather look like a pauper in comparison

Ma, however, the co-founder and former executive chairman of Alibaba Group, a multinational technology conglomerate, has an eye-watering personal value of $38.5billion (£31b), making him one the richest individuals in the world.

Mayweather and Pacquiao met in their 'battle of the century' showdown inside the famous Madison Square Garden in May 2015.

The fight, still seen as controversial to this day, ended in Mayweather taking victory by a unanimous points decision, and maintaining his undefeated record.
description: Manny Pacquiao has issued a direct call-out to his age old rival Floyd Mayweather, offering the boxing legend an interesting proposition.
